104_electric_provider.definition: Primary electric utility serving the property address.
preferred_sources: official utility service territory / address lookup
104_electric_provider.how_to_decide: If multiple utilities appear, pick the one explicitly stating service for the exact address/ZIP/city service area; otherwise return null.

106_water_provider.definition: Primary water utility serving the property address.
preferred_sources: official utility service territory / address lookup
106_water_provider.how_to_decide: If multiple utilities appear, pick the one explicitly stating service for the exact address/ZIP/city service area; otherwise return null.

120_flood_risk_level.definition: FEMA flood zone designation or flood risk category for the property.
120_flood_risk_level.how_to_decide: Must match exact address or parcel. If only general area data, return null.

124_hurricane_risk.definition: Hurricane risk level or evacuation zone for the property location.
124_hurricane_risk.how_to_decide: Use official evacuation zone if available; otherwise use historical hurricane frequency for county/region.

35_annual_taxes.definition: Most recent annual property tax amount (USD).
preferred_sources: county property appraiser / tax collector record page
35_annual_taxes.how_to_decide: Must be address/parcel-specific. If only tax rate is found, return null (do not estimate).
